layman_description: A metal ventilation fan that blows air, useful for decoration or creating airflow effects in buildings.
technical_description: Loot block using metal material with a model entity for the ventilation fan object.
player_impact: Provides a decorative appliance block that can be looted and repurposed in constructions.

layman_description: A larger ventilation fan made from two connected units, taking up a 2x1 space in your base.
technical_description: A 2x1 multi-block copied from the single ventilation fan with a different 3D shape.
player_impact: Offers a bigger ventilation solution for larger room designs and base layouts.

layman_description: A standalone air conditioning unit made of metal that cools the area around it.
technical_description: Loot block using metal material with a model entity and no water flow restrictions.
player_impact: Provides a functional cooling block that players can loot from or integrate into bases.

layman_description: A closed mailbox that holds treasure inside, one of several colored mailbox options in apartments.
technical_description: Loot container with a 2x1 multi-block size, using thin metal material and PObox loot list.
player_impact: Common loot source found in apartments that rewards players for searching abandoned locations.

layman_description: A blue-tinted mailbox that's closed, hiding loot inside from the main mailbox type.
technical_description: Variation copied from the base mailbox with a blue tint applied to the icon and 3D shape.
player_impact: Provides visual variety while maintaining the same loot rewards as other colored mailboxes.

layman_description: A green-tinted mailbox that's sealed shut, containing the same rewards as other color variants.
technical_description: Variation copied from the base mailbox with green color setting applied.
player_impact: Adds visual customization options without changing gameplay value or reward amounts.

layman_description: A grey-tinted mailbox still sealed, one of many decorative color options for apartment loot boxes.
technical_description: Variation copied from the base mailbox with grey color setting applied.
player_impact: Provides visual choices in looting areas without affecting actual item rewards.

layman_description: A red-tinted mailbox that remains closed, blending various color options in apartment complexes.
technical_description: Variation copied from the base mailbox with red tint applied to create visual diversity.
player_impact: Allows for varied aesthetics in apartment designs while maintaining consistent loot mechanics.

layman_description: A white or neutral-colored mailbox that hasn't been opened, storing apartment mail items.
technical_description: Variation copied from the base mailbox with white color setting applied.
player_impact: Maintains standard loot mechanics with neutral visual appearance in apartment layouts.

layman_description: A yellow-tinted mailbox in closed position, part of the apartment's loot variety.
technical_description: Variation copied from the base mailbox with yellow color setting applied.
player_impact: Offers color customization for visual design without changing loot values.

layman_description: A mailbox that's already been opened and looted, showing it's been picked through.
technical_description: Open version copied from the closed mailbox, changing the 3D shape to show opened state.
player_impact: Indicates a mailbox that's already been searched, affecting player exploration strategy.

layman_description: An opened blue-tinted mailbox, already ransacked by other survivors or time.
technical_description: Blue variation copied from the open mailbox, maintaining the open state with tint applied.
player_impact: Shows a mailbox already explored, influencing where players should search for fresh loot.

layman_description: A green-tinted mailbox left open, already searched through by previous scavengers.
technical_description: Green variation copied from the open mailbox with tint applied to the 3D shape.
player_impact: Signals to players that this location has been previously looted.

layman_description: A grey opened mailbox, showing signs of previous looting activity.
technical_description: Grey variation copied from the open mailbox variant.
player_impact: Indicates a mailbox that's been searched, affecting exploration decisions.

layman_description: A red-tinted mailbox that's been opened and emptied by other survivors.
technical_description: Red variation copied from the open mailbox.
player_impact: Shows evidence of looting, helping players identify already-searched locations.

layman_description: A white opened mailbox, its contents presumably taken long ago.
technical_description: Open variation with white color copied from the open mailbox base.
player_impact: Marks a location as previously explored when encountered during searches.

layman_description: A yellow-tinted mailbox left in the open position, already looted.
technical_description: Yellow variation copied from the open mailbox with tint applied.
player_impact: Indicates prior looting activity at this location.

layman_description: A smaller blue mailbox in closed state, a developer variant for testing apartment layouts.
technical_description: Small mailbox variation copied from white base with blue tint applied.
player_impact: Provides a testing variant for apartment building and design purposes.

layman_description: A compact green mailbox still sealed, used for dev testing of apartment structures.
technical_description: Small mailbox variation with green color copied from the base small mailbox.
player_impact: Development tool for building apartment layouts with varied color options.

layman_description: A smaller grey mailbox remaining closed, part of developer testing tools.
technical_description: Small variant with grey tint copied from the white small mailbox base.
player_impact: Allows developers to test apartment layouts with different visual configurations.

technical_description: Small mailbox variation with red tint copied from the base small mailbox.
player_impact: Dev tool for testing apartment structure variations.

technical_description: Small mailbox variant with yellow tint copied from the white base version.
player_impact: Dev tool for apartment layout design and color scheme testing.

layman_description: A smaller blue mailbox left open by developers during testing phases.

layman_description: A helper block that lets you pick different stove variants when building.

layman_description: A bright green marker block used by developers to indicate arrow placement zones.

layman_description: A purple developer marker used to show purple arrow zones.
technical_description: Arrow marker variant with purple tint for developer identification.
player_impact: Development tool for marking purple arrow placement areas.

layman_description: An automatic turret that shoots bullets at enemies when powered, protecting your base.
technical_description: Ranged defense block requiring 15 power, firing 9mm ammunition at up to 30 blocks distance.
player_impact: Powerful automated defense requiring electricity, dealing 32 damage per shot to entities.
